body:
Ships 78.3 million iPhones in Q1 (that is in Apple's first quarter of its 2017 fiscal year)

And ... now for my regular editorial ... ditch the iThingy, buy an Android!

And, if there are any Canadians reading this, ditch the Blackberry ... buy an Android!
title: Apple (AAPL) earnings announcement: $3.36 EPS (expected $3.23)
